item.title: Root CTF 2018
item.description: The time has come to do it again! Root CTF, a CTF event organized by CyberSecNITD every year in TerraTechnica NITD’s Annual Techfest. The CTF was Jeopardy style and was conducted in offline mode. We witnessed 11 teams having students from NITD and from other Colleges too. That was a huge progress for us from RootCTF17 where all our participants were students from NITD only. Since last year’s CTF, we got the opportunity to learn more on topics in CyberSecurity.
